amendment.description: Amendment exempts Alaska and Hawaii from the per passenger subsidy cap of $500 for the essential air service program.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to add the words "in the 48 contiguous States" to the essential air service grants, which would exempt Hawaii and Alaska from the subsidy cap of $500 per passenger.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Young (AK) amendment (A004) Agreed to by recorded vote: 239 - 175 (Roll no. 420).
